bibl.title: Fayyum Studies 1 (2004). (Alma Mater Studiorum. Università di Bologna. Dipartimento di Archeologia.)
bibl.note: Fayyum Studies is not a new journal, but a series of volumes which will not be published regularly and which are part of the "Fayyum Project" of the Department of Archaeology of the University of Bologna. - 9 contributions.
bibl.seg: PERNIGOTTI Sergio and Marco ZECCHI (Edd.), Fayyum Studies 1 (2004). (Alma Mater Studiorum. Università di Bologna. Dipartimento di Archeologia.)
Bologna, Ante Quem, 2004, 4°, 86 pp., figg., plans. ISBN 88-7849-004-0. €20.

Fayyum Studies is not a new journal, but a series of volumes which will not be published regularly and which are part of the "Fayyum Project" of the Department of Archaeology of the University of Bologna. - 9 contributions.
